import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button } from '../components/Button'; const Home = () => { return (

Explore Features

{[ { title: 'Telemedicine', desc: 'Consult doctors online via secure video.', to: '/telemedicine' }, { title: 'Emergency Care', desc: 'Get help fast in urgent situations.', to: '/emergency-care' }, { title: 'Find a Doctor', desc: 'Search specialists and book visits.', to: '/doctor-finder' }, { title: 'Appointments', desc: 'Schedule and manage your bookings.', to: '/appointment-booking' }, { title: 'Pharmacy', desc: 'Order medicines and manage prescriptions.', to: '/pharmacy' }, { title: 'Health Records', desc: 'Keep and access your medical files.', to: '/health-records' }, { title: 'Insurance Support', desc: 'Navigate coverage and claims.', to: '/insurance-support' }, { title: 'Prescription OCR', desc: 'Scan prescriptions into text.', to: '/prescription-ocr' }, { title: 'Voice Control', desc: 'Use voice to navigate and record.', to: '/voice-control' }, ].map((f) => (

); }; export default Home;
